name: Disco Fit - AR Dance Games
description:
Dance and exercise to the music anytime, any place!
Disco fit is an AR dance game where you dance to music.

All you need is a phone or tablet.
Use the front camera to move together with the falling notes.

Now, when you spend more time at home and can't get as much exercise as usual, is the time to dance to some music and get fit!

There are two game modes!

• Normal mode
For exercise with easy dances.

• Hard mode
Challenge yourself with more complicated choreography,
made by the back dancers of famous artists.

Can you get a perfect score?

• How to play
Set your phone or tablet upright to play.
It goes perfectly with a stand!
You can play just as well by propping it up on other objects.
